Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a complicated system with heat and mass transfer as well as electrochemical reactions.

Sentencas: The real-time dynamic simulation of SOFC is still a challenge up to now.

Sentencas: This paper develops a one-dimensional mathematical model for direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (DIR-SOFC).
Titulo: Modeling and simulation of solid oxide fuel cell based on the volume-resistance characteristic modeling technique

Sentencas: The volume-resistance (V-R) characteristic modeling technique is introduced into the modeling of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Modeling and simulation of solid oxide fuel cell based on the volume-resistance characteristic modeling technique

Sentencas: Based on the V-R modeling technique and the modular modeling idea, ordinary differential equations meeting the quick simulation are obtained from partial differential equations.
Titulo: Modeling and simulation of solid oxide fuel cell based on the volume-resistance characteristic modeling technique

Sentencas: This model takes into account the variation of local gas properties.
Titulo: Modeling and simulation of solid oxide fuel cell based on the volume-resistance characteristic modeling technique

Sentencas: It can not only reflect the distributed parameter characteristics of SOFC, but also meet the requirement of the real-time dynamic simulation.
Titulo: Modeling and simulation of solid oxide fuel cell based on the volume-resistance characteristic modeling technique

Sentencas: The results indicate that the V-R characteristic modeling technique is valuable and viable in the SOFC system, and the model can be used in the quick dynamic and real-time simulation.
